backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the player name input fix to SnakeGamePage.tsx and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files, their styles, configs, and game logic roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme CSS variables, dark mode variants, and global border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the SnakeGamePage.
frontend/src/components/ControlLegend.ts: UI component showing keyboard controls with icons and labels.
frontend/src/components/HudBar.tsx: HUD bar displaying player name and score with stable layout and icons.
frontend/src/game/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Responsive canvas renderer that draws the snake game using DPI-aware rendering and dynamic sizing.
frontend/src/game/useImpulseSnake.ts: React hook implementing core Snake game state, movement, collision logic, and animation loop management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a Dfinity backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom utilities for grid background and responsive playfield layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/SnakeGamePage.tsx: Implements the main Snake game page with keyboard controls, start logic, HUD, and playfield rendering.
